name: Drawing World 1.2.0
description:
<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

Gameplay lol

It wouldn't let me add it lol

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Instructions~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

S to toggle settings

Modes: 1: Pen. 2: Eraser. 3: Stamp. 3: Spray

Smoothness: how fast the Pen is. can be used to make smooth lines

P to preview a stamp

N to Erase all of your drawing

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Stamps~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

1-16: Bambi (2D) rig parts

17: angry donut

18: Hearts

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Stuff to add~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

A straight-line maker (Maybe press space to pause?)

Vector Maker

Fill tool

Vector pen (It is very pixelated, and maybe clones for stamps because it PIXELIZES THEM!!!!!!!!!! EVEN VECTORS!!! and maybe to animate them too...)

Drawing Save Codes (Y'know, let's call them DSC's)

Different sounds for different Stamps. e.g., Donut (Stamp 17) would be Donut yelling to tell the voters how to vote (BFB 2)

Make mobile mode less quality so the game can FRIGGIN START 

A ZIP file cuz this game deserves a window instead of being trapped in a browser. I have a zip file, it's just too big.
